productDetails.name: Button Back Bespoke Sofa
productDetails.description:
The Button Back bespoke sofa has a classic look, with its carved feet, sloping arms and deep pulled button detailing.

It has feather filled cushions for comfort and all you’ve got to do is choose from 36 different fabric options!

Your beautifully hand made upholstery is manufactured right here in the UK.

There is also a sofa and armchair available in this collection.
productDetails.dimensions:
Overall: 205cm wide, 105cm deep, 85cm high

Seat size: 148cm wide, 65 deep, 48 high
productDetails.deliveryinfo:
We use a two man, white glove, delivery service for our larger items. The charges vary depending on the size and quantity of your order.

Once your order is ready for delivery to your home, you will receive a telephone call to arrange a mutually suitable date, which will be within 3-5 days of them contacting you.

On arrival the delivery team will request that you show them where you would like your item(s) delivered, so that they can see where they’re going.

They will unpack your item and take away all the packaging for you once you are happy with the item.

If your furniture requires some assembly there may be a charge, depending on what’s involved. Adding legs to tables for example will not incur any costs, but complex flat pack items are charged at £35 per 30 minutes. This is an optional service but products that are not put together by the delivery team are unable to be returned.

productDetails.name: Vintage brown leather chair
productDetails.description:
This gorgeous vintage leather chair is so irresistible and can go in any room. With classic curves and soft, supple, top grain leather, it sits proud on its solid ash legs

Buy the matching footstool for some serious feet up relaxation enjoyment
